Articles.Content:
Hey space fans,

(that tiny white dot framed by the hangar door is a Kerbal)

This was actually the first craft I created in 0.90, but I had never actually launched it because it causes my framerate to drop to less than 1 fps;.; But I pulled it back up today, and was able to edit it into space. It looks great, and I really wish I could have fun with it, but my computer just can't handle it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Features two sets of operable hangar bay doors.

Thought I'd share it with y'all in case any of you have computers that can handle it. Let me know if you want the .craft file. And let me know what you think!

GATOR

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

DOWNLOAD

Edited January 10, 2015 by gGATORr
I would love to give it a try. I have a new I7 rig with GTX 760 I just fired up and have been getting back in to 0.9.

Man...

That is way bigger than my 'Annabelle' carrier.Maybe it's one third or fifth of this thing....

I would love to give it a try. I have a new I7 rig with GTX 760 I just fired up and have been getting back in to 0.9.

Roger that, download link in the original post.

Man...

That is way bigger than my 'Annabelle' carrier.Maybe it's one third or fifth of this thing....

Maybe this carrier could carry your carrier!
Wow gGATORr do you just increse the size of older ships or do you start from scratch whats the part count

God ****** dammit *goes to build a tier 6 ship*

I would give you rep but it hasn't been long enough.

Edited January 11, 2015 by Spartwo

k

Edited February 23, 2016 by applepie

Wow gGATORr do you just increse the size of older ships or do you start from scratch whats the part count

Start from scratch. I'm more of a creator than a tweaker. I'd rather build something new than improve something I've already built. Oh, and 889 (including all the launch clamps)

God ****** dammit *goes to build a tier 6 ship*

I would give you rep but it hasn't been long enough.

Let the arms race begin! (unfortunately, my computer will melt if I even think about building anything bigger)

Wow nice how many parts?

mine space carrier contains out 1242 parts

which butthurts my intel hd 3000

Yea, I'm pretty sure my computer would explode haha. And its 889 parts. I'd say close to 100 of those are launch clamps though. You can see the crazy number of them in one of the pictures in the album
Well, loaded fine and looks great!!! Doesm't hurt my I7 and GTX 760 too bad!!

Well, loaded fine and looks great!!! Doesm't hurt my I7 and GTX 760 too bad!!

http://i.imgur.com/C7nk8hw.png

Dude, I'm so jealous right now. That does look great! How badly unbalanced is the thrust?

If it was a plane, it would be nose heavy, so the engines are causing down thrust. Not terribly significant but it definitely won't fly in a straight line without help. Groups/pods of engines run out of fuel at about 60 sec, 90 sec, 120 sec, etc. This was after about 2 minutes (and the spin on the craft was about 5 revs per minute).

Nice! Looks like that thing totally dwarfs the mega carrier I made a while back!

Edited January 11, 2015 by DerpenWolf

Nice! Looks like that thing totally dwarfs the mega carrier I made a while back! http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/41982944541461728/037E41B211057FB6A96B4B2B17513FCEF063276E/

That it does. However, your carrier is quite impressive!
